reviewText: All children should see this video instead of getting loads of presents for Christmas

We bought this video years ago when the children were younger and I was excited to find another one.  The truths and values presented are so relevant in the times we live in. It can be a great teaching tool as well.  We enjoy watching anytime of the year!  Wish it was in a DVD format

My grandmother bought this movie when I was three, along with The Little Troll Prince, and I still watch them EVERY year around christmas time (and I am now 20 years old).  It is an awesome movie with a great story line and has a great christian value set.  It is an old movie, but it is still one of my favorite movies and I am now an adult.
